hero.heading: From Dirt to Deals: Where Raw Land Becomes Real Opportunity
hero.subheading: Landbusters is your front-row seat to the real estate development process—from site selection to financial modeling to vertical execution.

learn.title: Join to Learn
learn.subheading: We don’t just talk real estate—we build dealmakers.
learn.p1: Learn how to source, analyze, and structure development opportunities with the same precision and strategy we use in our own projects.
learn.p2: Whether you're a broker, city planner, or early-stage investor, we’ll equip you with the tools to uncover opportunities others miss—and the support to take them further.
learn.p3: As your development back office, we provide:
learn.list1: Site feasibility studies through Zero to Plan
learn.list5: Strategic feedback and potential partnership with Marston Development Group

invest.title: Join to Invest
invest.subheading: Our investors don’t chase trends—they fund strategic growth.
invest.p1: At Marston, we focus on real estate opportunities that are data-backed, demand-driven, and made possible by smart incentives.
invest.p2: From tax abatements and grants to public-private partnerships, we use every available tool to unlock projects that wouldn’t otherwise pencil—while accelerating absorption through attainable, workforce-oriented housing.
invest.p3: These aren’t speculative bets—they’re targeted investments designed to meet visible, underserved needs in high-growth markets.
invest.list1: Land Entitlement Plays – Acquire raw land, unlock value through zoning and approvals
invest.list2: Full-Cycle Development – Invest from land through construction and stabilization

row2.title: This is how We Work
row2.text: Watch how we walk the site and capture data on grading, access, and potential challenges before acquisition.

row3.title: Reynaldo Vivas – The Dealmaker
row3.text: Rey brings design and finance together to turn land into reality. With a background in real estate development, deal structuring, and project feasibility, he leads negotiations, aligns interests, and crafts win-win deals that work on paper—and in the real world.

row4.title: Ray Vivas – The Analyst
row4.text: With a background in acquisitions and modeling, Ray makes sure the numbers work before the shovel hits the ground. He brings institutional-grade underwriting to every project and helps shape deal strategies that align with investor goals.

row5.title: Anthony – The Architect
row5.text: Anthony turns site constraints into compelling design. He shapes the massing and program strategy that drive feasibility, and ensures architecture serves both community and investor outcomes.

sponsors.title: Meet Our Sponsors: The Engine Behind Every Deal

marston.name: Marston Group
marston.desc: Real estate investment firm offering curated opportunities in land entitlement and full development. Only for accredited investors.

zero.name: Zero to Plan
zero.desc: Feasibility analysis services combining architectural massing and financial modeling. The first step to any smart project.

atex.name: Atex Group
atex.desc: Owner representation and development management—pushing projects through design, permitting, and execution.
